channel.title: CVE Feed for PrestaShop -- ps_facetedsearch

item.title: CVE-2020-5277|2024-08-04T08:22:09.180Z -- prestashop -- ps_facetedsearch
item.description: PrestaShop module ps_facetedsearch versions before 3.5.0 has a reflected XSS with `url_name` parameter. The problem is fixed in 3.5.0
